author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

Backported from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33637
* Mass precision in NanoGen was low -> increased to RECO precision, and allow for full precision
* Increase mass precision for SUSY particles in NanoAod

Backported from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32431
* Fix bugs in genparticle pruning functions in NanoGen

#### PR validation:

Ran NanoGen, checked Z mass distribution, precision looks sufficient for analysis now:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1311783/117166157-671cc280-adc6-11eb-8ceb-114f1e9c5d33.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33637 https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32431

@mariadalfonso @kdlong
title: Mass precision in NanoGen + NanoAod, fix customization functions (10_6_X)
